title: Researching the Data to Create a Bio for the CEOs of Tech Companies Worth Over $1 Trillion
description: The goal is to gather detailed biographical information about the CEOs of tech companies with a market capitalization exceeding $1 trillion.

queries.title: Identify Tech Companies Worth Over $1 Trillion
queries.search: List of tech companies with a market cap over $1 trillion as of November 2024
queries.questions: Which tech companies currently have a market capitalization exceeding $1 trillion? What is the market cap of each company?

queries.title: Identify CEO Names for Each Company
queries.search: Who is the CEO for [list:<company name>] as of November 2024
queries.questions: What is the name of the CEO for [list:<just company name>]?

queries.title: Gather Biographical Information for Each CEO
queries.questions: What is the full name of the [list:company name] CEO [list:ceo name]? What is their date and place of birth? What is their educational background? What is their career history leading up to their current role? What notable achievements or milestones have they accomplished as CEO? Are there any personal details or philanthropic activities mentioned?

queries.title: Verify and Update Market Cap Information
queries.questions: What is the most recent market capitalization of [list:company_name]? Is it still over $1 trillion?

queries.title: Identify Key Achievements of Each CEO in Their Current Role
queries.questions: What are the major achievements of [list:<company name> CEO <ceo name>]? Have they overseen any significant product launches, acquisitions, or strategic initiatives? How have they impacted the companys growth or market position?

queries.title: Explore Public Perception and Media Coverage of Each CEO
queries.questions: What is the public perception of [list:<company name> CEO <ceo name>]? Are there any controversies, challenges, or notable media coverage associated with them? How are they viewed by employees, investors, and the general public?

queries.title: Investigate Philanthropic Activities or Personal Interests
queries.search: [list:<company name> CEO <ceo name>] philanthropy or personal interests
queries.questions: What philanthropic activities or charitable contributions is [list:<company name> CEO <ceo name>] involved in? Do they have any notable personal interests, hobbies, or affiliations outside of their professional role?

queries.title: Summarize Key Leadership Style and Vision
queries.search: [list:<company name> CEO <ceo name>] leadership style and vision
queries.questions: What is [list:<company name> CEO <ceo name>]s leadership style? What is their vision for the company? How do they approach innovation, company culture, and long-term strategy?
